original: 久聞將軍威名，與你<color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color>討教武藝，單挑決勝，可願應允？(選擇拒絕將減少我方士氣值200)
text: I have heard the general's reputation for a long time, and <color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color> asks you about martial arts, singles out and wins, are you willing to agree? (Choose to refuse will reduce our morale by 200)
